UData\Widgets\UIImage

Creates a widget that represents the HTML image element

Information
Extends

UData\Widgets\StdBase

Options

This widget accepts standard options, as well as the following non-standard options:

<UData\HTTP\Url> url

Is a url object.

$opts = null

Is optional or one of:

<UData\HTTP\Url>

A Url object, url's given in this form are taken verbatium from the object.

An options object containing the options for the widget.

A string representing a server root source url
